snippet: Don’t call it a “campaign” for president of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences. But the contenders are lining up and alliances are quietly being sealed.
abstract: Contenders for president of Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences are lining up and forming alliances; 43-member board of governors prepares to meet in late July or early August to choose between leading prospects, Cheryl Boone Isaacs and Robert Freidman, one of whom will succeed Hawk Koch.
lead_paragraph: Don’t call it a “campaign” for president of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences. But the contenders are lining up and alliances are quietly being sealed.

headline.main: In Oscar’s Home, the Ritual of Picking Its Next President Gets Under Way
headline.print_headline: In Oscar’s Home, the Ritual of Picking Its Next President Gets Under Way

keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
